p: The performance of each estimated model was generated by the "area under curve" (AUC). In this case, AUC values equal or close to 1 indicate excellent accuracy. Values equal to or less than 0.5 are predictive results that are not as good as those obtained randomly [ 36]. Some studies suggest that the application of ROC AUC is essentially a very reliable measure of accuracy when compared to other estimators [ 37, 38].
